section.heading: Substantial compliance with donor-imposed formal requirement.

para.text: A powerholder's substantial compliance with a formal requirement of appointment imposed by the donor, including a requirement that the instrument exercising the power of appointment make reference or specific reference to the power, is sufficient if:
The powerholder knows of and intends to exercise the power; and
The powerholder's manner of attempted exercise of the power does not impair a material purpose of the donor in imposing the requirement.
